title: [Startup Bharat] This retail-tech startup is revamping kiranas in tier III cities in Andhra Pradesh - YourStory
content: [Startup Bharat] This retail-tech startup is revamping kiranas in tier III cities in Andhra Pradesh  YourStory
description: Founded by BITS Pilani batchmates Neeraj Menta and Anil Thontepu in 2021, Kadapa, Andhra Pradesh-based SuperK is a tech-enabled franchised grocery retail chain.
